channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins TestNG Results Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins TestNG Results Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34778|2024-08-03T09:22:10.390Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20testng%20results%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins TestNG Results Plugin 554.va4a552116332 and earlier renders the unescaped test descriptions and exception messages provided in test results if certain job-level options are set, resulting in a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs or control test results.
